Row.Text: Crops have been poor this year in {2_CityName}. But the local {1_TribeDesc} have offered some of their food supplies to us. Their supplies are not nearly enough, but if we were to raid their villages, we might find more.
Raid them for all the food they have.
Throw money at him until he finds us new lands!
We will not take their food.
City loses 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population. Gain {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points.
We have raided the Tribe's food stores. They have been slaughtered, but our people will eat.
We have accepted the Tribe's food, but it is not enough to stave off the famine entirely.
We have declined the Tribe's food, and decided to brave the famine.
